ARABIC: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِمَن كَذَّبَ بِٱلسَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But instead, they deny the Hour; and We have prepared a Searing Blaze for those who deny the Hour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they reject the Hour as untrue. We have prepared a Fire for those who deny the Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The fact of the matter is that these people have denied "the Hour", --And for the one who denies the coming of the Hour, We have prepared a blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They deny the Hour of Doom so We have prepared for them a burning fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact they deny the Last Day; and We have kept prepared a blazing fire for those who deny the Last Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, they deny the Hour, and for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared a flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But they reject the hour, and We have prepared a burning fire for him who rejects the hour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but they cry lies to the Hour; and We have prepared for him who cries lies to the Hour a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but they deny (the coming of) the Hour, and for those who deny (the coming of) the Hour We have prepared a flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They deny the Hour. For those who deny that Hour, We have prepared a blazing fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Aye! they belie the Hour; and We have gotten ready for him who belieth the Hour a Flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, they deny the Hour, and We have prepared a Blaze for those who deny the Hour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay they deny the hour (of the judgment to come): but We have prepared a blazing fire for such as deny the hour:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, they deny the Hour (the Day of Resurrection), and for those who deny the Hour, We have prepared a flaming Fire (i.e. Hell).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, they belied the Hour. We have prepared for him who belied the Hour a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they have denied the Hour, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a Blaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:11] Nay, but they deny the [coming of the] Hour, the Resurrection, and We have prepared for those who deny the Hour a blaze (sa‘īr), a fire that has been set ablaze (musa‘‘ara), in other words, an intense [fire].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but they deny the Hour) they deny the coming of the Hour, (and for those who deny (the coming of) 397 the Hour We have prepared a Flame) the Fire and its fuel.
